attributes.action: Investagation in the mental health care received by Southern Health Hampshire
attributes.additional_details: just look at my own case and the failings by the trust and my own GP practice!!
attributes.background: How many of us have been left in crisis by poorly care packages, medication mess ups, the fundamentals of care in the community and how to improve the service so more lives are not lost!!

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you have a complaint about NHS services, the Parliamentary and Health Service Ombudsman may be able to give you advice:

http://www.ombudsman.org.uk/
